definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The 100 over-water bungalows perch on stilts above the turquoise lagoon.
sentences.chinese: 在100個水平房鱸魚上方的綠松石瀉湖高蹺。

sentences.english: It is like picking up a turquoise of whitish luster.
sentences.chinese: 猶如拾了一塊白光的松石。

sentences.english: Pearlescent pewter with turquoise shimmer over a charcoal base.
sentences.chinese: 在炭灰色基調上閃耀着珠光錫金與綠松石光芒。

sentences.english: Gold was frequently decorated with three colors of cornelian , turquoise lapis lazuli.
sentences.chinese: 黃金常常裝飾三種顏色的瑪瑙，綠松石青金石。

sentences.english: Powder-perfect sand squishes between the toes and warm turquoise waves lap the beach.
sentences.chinese: 海灘衝擊着腳趾和溫暖的綠松石之間的沙粒。

sentences.english: The island of Roatan diving is the most beautiful turquoise surrounded the warm water.
sentences.chinese: 羅阿坦島潛水點是最美麗的綠松石溫暖水域包圍。
黑色帶藍色和綠松石色閃片。

sentences.english: Company is located in Chongqing, China, turquoise attached to No. 3 North 150.
sentences.chinese: 公司位於中國重慶市松石北路150附3號。

sentences.english: The intensity of the turquoise striation is also reduced.
sentences.chinese: 也減少綠松石線狀的強度。

sentences.english: Therefore, the wire is not to judge the authenticity of a turquoise standard.
sentences.chinese: 所以，鐵線是不能作爲綠松石判斷真僞的標準的。

sentences.english: Turquoise is a non-transparent mineral that varies in color and pattern.
sentences.chinese: 綠松石是一種不透明的礦物，在不同顏色和圖案。

definition: lapis lazuli (mineral of the square albite family)
